creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: black dress with predominately red embroidery along with several other color accents; neck opening is circular with slit running vertically in front; embroidery consists of geometric patterns and is primarily located in front chest area, back area, and along proper left side; proper right side of dress has pocket with red stitching; sleeves extend straight out from shoulder; along the inside of the bottom of the dress is embroidered floral designs
title: Dress
